items.title: Show HN: Illustria – AI illustration generator with free downloadable gallery
items.raw_excerpt:
Hi HN I built Illustria – a simple tool to generate custom illustrations on demand Why I built it:
- I was frustrated spending hours browsing stock sites for the right visuals.
- Free illustrations often didn’t match the style I needed.
- I wanted a faster way to get usable illustrations for landing pages, pitch decks, and side projects. What it does today:
- Generate illustrations instantly based on your input (first generation is free).
- Explore different looks/styles without needing design skills.
- Download and use them right away.
- Browse a free gallery of ready-made illustrations: https://arcanvia.com/illustria/gallery I’d love feedback on:
- Would you actually use this for your side projects?
- What features would make it more valuable for you?

items.title: Show HN: dumpall — Dump project code into AI-ready Markdown
items.raw_excerpt: dumpall: The smart file aggregator for AI context and code reviews I've built a new CLI utility called dumpall that solves a pain point I've often had: needing to quickly provide a structured dump of project files to an AI for context, or to a colleague for a code review. The core idea is to follow the Unix philosophy: do one thing well. dumpall recursively reads files in a directory, respects exclusions (like node_modules or .git), and formats the output into clean Markdown fenced code blocks. Key Features: LLM-Optimized: Output is designed for easy consumption by large language models, providing clean and structured context. Clipboard Integration: Use the --clip flag to send the entire output directly to your clipboard. Smart Exclusions: Easily ignore unwanted directories and files. Vers

items.title: Show HN: Nanobot – Turn MCP servers into full AI agents
items.raw_excerpt: Today we're releasing Nanobot an open-source framework for building AI agents on top of the Model Context Protocol (MCP). MCP servers are a great way to expose structured tools, but they’re usually just that—collections of functions. Nanobot makes it simple to wrap any MCP server with reasoning, a system prompt, and orchestration so it behaves like a real agent. Even better, Nanobot fully supports MCP-UI, so agents can pass rich interactive components (forms, dashboards, even mini-apps) directly into chat. A simple example: if you had a Blackjack MCP server with tools like deal, bet, and hit, you could wrap it with Nanobot to create a dealer agent that knows how to explain the game, guide a player, and render an interactive Blackjack table inside chat. We built this because we wanted agent

A simple example: if you had a Blackjack MCP server with tools like deal, bet, and hit, you could wrap it with Nanobot to create a dealer agent that knows how to explain the game, guide a player, and render an interactive Blackjack table inside chat. We built this because we wanted agent
excerpt_i18n.zh: 今天我们发布Nanobot，这是一个基于模型上下文协议（MCP）构建AI代理的开源框架。MCP服务器是暴露结构化工具的绝佳方式，但它们通常仅止于此——即工具集合。

items.title: Launch HN: Cactus (YC S25) – AI inference on smartphones
items.raw_excerpt: Hey HN, Henry & Roman here, we are building Cactus ( https://cactuscompute.com/ ), an AI inference engine specifically designed for phones. We're seeing a major push towards on-device AI, and for good reason: on-device AI decreases latency from >1sec to Also, tools and agentic designs make small models really good beyond benchmarks. This has been corroborated by other papers like https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.02153 , and we see model companies like DeepMind aggressively going into smaller models with Gemma3 270m and 308m. We found Qwen3 600m to be great at tool calls for instance. Some frameworks already try to solve this but in my previous job, they struggled in production compared to research and playgrounds: - They optimise for modern devices but 70% of phones today are low-mid budget. - B

items.title: 淘宝悄悄做起AI搜索
items.raw_excerpt: 最近顾枫陷入了深深的苦恼：他准备参加一个朋友的小孩生日宴，由于平时极少接触儿童，他始终想不出应该买什么样的礼物，既显得不失礼数，又符合小朋友的喜好。 淘宝近期推出的AI工具——AI万能搜，正好帮他解决了燃眉之急。 “AI万能搜”是今年8月中旬，淘宝上线的一款基于大模型的AI问答产品，支持深度思考，用户可以用自然语言提问，AI会生成一份融合了文字、商品、视频图片的“答案”，引导用户选择商品及下单。 这并不是淘宝在电商搜索领域唯一的AI新产品。雷峰网了解到，淘宝还正在灰测“AI助手”，其类似于导购员的角色，能引导用户理清自己的真实需求，并精准给出筛选结果。 虽说两款产品都处于低调测试阶段，官方没有对外宣传，但仍有被外界关注到并引发了不少讨论。有人认为AI不够可信、思考反应偏慢，也有人对“AI导购”的构想极为赞叹。 那么，对比其他AI大模型应用，淘宝这两款AI搜索产品真的能成为用户的智慧大脑，做好导购员角色吗？它究竟好不好用？雷峰网来测试一番。 AI 万能搜和 AI 助手，到底有什么不一样 AI助手和AI万能搜的本质，都是通过AI来提升用户在淘宝的搜索体验，功能上二者各有千秋，却也都能满足用户不同的痛点。 它们的区别在于，一个可以解决用户想买一个东西但说不清具体要什么样的、需要一个导购来帮助细化需求的问题；而另一个则更像一个私人助理，可以解决用户不知道要买什么的问题。 淘宝AI助手切中的场景就是前者，当用户不知道如何描述需求时，可以直接点击AI生成的标签，AI能够智能回答，快速解决用户商品筛选、对比等购物决策问题。 不过这款产品目前还在灰度测试中，打开淘宝在搜索框输入手机（也可以输入其他品类），会看到右下角的AI图标（如下图左），一键点击就能唤醒。当然，AI助手在商品的信息流里还内置了一个卡片式的入口（如下图右）。 从体感来说，这两个入口的设置非常用心，照顾到了不同人群的购物特点

title_i18n.zh: 淘宝悄悄做起AI搜索
title_i18n.en: Taobao quietly launched an AI search feature.
title_i18n.es: Taobao comienza discretamente a implementar búsquedas con IA.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 最近顾枫陷入了深深的苦恼：他准备参加一个朋友的小孩生日宴，由于平时极少接触儿童，他始终想不出应该买什么样的礼物，既显得不失礼数，又符合小朋友的喜好。 淘宝近期推出的AI工具——AI万能搜，正好帮他解决了燃眉之急。 “AI万能搜”是今年8月中旬，淘宝上线的一款基于大模型的AI问答产品，支持深度思考，用户可以用自然语言提问，AI会生成一份融合了文字、商品、视频图片的“答案”，引导用户选择商品及下单。 这并不是淘宝在电商搜索领域唯一的AI新产品。雷峰网了解到，淘宝还正在灰测“AI助手”，其类似于导购员的角色，能引导用户理清自己的真实需求，并精准给出筛选结果。 虽说两款产品都处于低调测试阶段，官方没有对外宣传，但仍有被外界关注到并引发了不少讨论。有人认为AI不够可信、思考反应偏慢，也有人对“AI导购”的构想极为赞叹。 那么，对比其他AI大模型应用，淘宝这两款AI搜索产品真的能成为用户的智慧大脑，做好导购员角色吗？它究竟好不好用？雷峰网来测试一番。 AI 万能搜和 AI 助手，到底有什么不一样 AI助手和AI万能搜的本质，都是通过AI来提升用户在淘宝的搜索体验，功能上二者各有千秋，却也都能满足用户不同的痛点。 它们的区别在于，一个可以解决用户想买一个东西但说不清具体要什么样的、需要一个导购来帮助细化需求的问题；而另一个则更像一个私人助理，可以解决用户不知道要买什么的问题。 淘宝AI助手切中的场景就是前者，当用户不知道如何描述需求时，可以直接点击AI生成的标签，AI能够智能回答，快速解决用户商品筛选、对比等购物决策问题。 不过这款产品目前还在灰度测试中，打开淘宝在搜索框输入手机（也可以输入其他品类），会看到右下角的AI图标（如下图左），一键点击就能唤醒。当然，AI助手在商品的信息流里还内置了一个卡片式的入口（如下图右）。 从体感来说，这两个入口的设置非常用心，照顾到了不同人群的购物特点
excerpt_i18n.en:
Recently, Gu Feng found himself deeply troubled: he was preparing to attend a friend's child's birthday party but, having little exposure to children, couldn't decide on an appropriate gift that would be both polite and appealing to the child. Taobao's recently launched AI tool—AI Wanneng Sou (AI Universal Search)—came to his rescue just in time.  

AI Wanneng Sou is an AI Q&A product based on a large model, launched by Taobao in mid-August this year. It supports deep thinking, allowing users to ask questions in natural language. The AI then generates an "answer" that combines text, products, videos, and images to guide users in selecting items and placing orders.  

This isn't Taobao's only new AI product in the e-commerce search domain. Leiphone learned that Taobao is also testing an "AI Assistant," which acts like a shopping guide, helping users clarify their real needs and providing precise filtering results.  

Although both products are in low-key testing phases with no official promotion, they have attracted external attention and sparked considerable discussion. Some question the AI's reliability and slower response times, while others are highly impressed with the concept of an "AI shopping guide."  

So, compared to other large AI model applications, can Taobao's two AI search products truly serve as users' intelligent brains and excel as shopping guides? How effective are they? Leiphone put them to the test.  

What exactly is the difference between AI Wanneng Sou and AI Assistant?  

At their core, both AI Assistant and AI Wanneng Sou aim to enhance users' search experience on Taobao through AI. While each has its unique strengths, both are designed to meet user needs.
excerpt_i18n.es: Recientemente, Gu Feng se encontraba sumido en una profunda preocupación: planeaba asistir a la fiesta de cumpleaños del hijo de un amigo, pero como rara vez tenía contacto con niños, no lograba decidir qué regalo comprar que fuera tanto apropiado como del agrado del pequeño. La herramienta de IA lanzada recientemente por Taobao, la Búsqueda Universal de IA, resolvió precisamente su urgencia. La Búsqueda Universal de IA es un producto de preguntas y respuestas basado en modelos de gran escala, lanzado por Taobao a mediados de agosto de este año, que admite razonamiento profundo. Los usuarios pueden hacer preguntas en lenguaje natural, y la IA genera una "respuesta" que combina texto, productos, videos e imágenes, guiando a los usuarios en la selección y compra de artículos. Esta no es la única innovación de Taobao en el campo de la búsqueda comercial con IA.

items.title: 腾讯云副总裁曹磊：“云 + AI”帮助消费电子蓄能出海，蓄势创新
items.raw_excerpt: “云+AI不仅能打破行业内卷的局限，帮助企业走出去，更能助力行业开辟新模式、挖掘新增长”9月17日，在2025腾讯全球数字生态大会消费电子专场，腾讯云副总裁、智能制造与智慧能源负责人曹磊表示。曹磊介绍，因为云技术与 AI 在消费电子行业的广泛应用和落地，今年，颠覆式的商业模式创新、更好支撑出海的常态、AI 场景应用的普及、及围绕体验融合的创新成为行业发展的几个显著趋势。   腾讯云副总裁、智能制造与智慧能源负责人曹磊     大模型深入业务全场景，驱动企业高效率增长 过去一年，消费电子行业价格竞争激烈，不少企业面临发展压力。而AI技术的应用，可推动行业从“拼低价”向“拼创新”转型。荣耀云平台首席架构师欧阳国柱表示，依托腾讯云在多模态数据处理、端到端自动化管理、多云灵活适配等领域的技术优势，荣耀顺利推动自身从“全云化”向“智能化”转型，双方联合开发的AI辅助编码工具，有效提升了研发人员的开发效率与代码质量，为产品创新提速奠定基础。   荣耀云平台首席架构师欧阳国柱   随着大模型的产业应用加速，企业不仅能够实现降本提效，还能挖掘新的增长空间。酷开智能系统研究院院长郭尚锋介绍道，酷开智能与腾讯云展开深度合作，构建了“影视、教育、健康、创作、生活、设备”的超级智能体架构，可提供精准影视推荐、教育学习、健康管理、语音查询电费等多元化服务，推动消费电子企业从“单一设备销售”的传统业务模式，向“服务与体验输出”的全新模式升级，进而实现增长。   酷开智能系统研究院院长郭尚锋 美的集团与腾讯云在全屋智能领域的合作，也是大模型应用的典型实践。美的集团中国区域、全屋智能研发总监谭荣港介绍道，从2022年为COLMO高端空调提供音乐内容和AI语音助手能力，到2024年为灵眸蒸烤箱植入AIoT能力，再到2025年将合作拓展

title_i18n.en: Tencent Cloud Vice President Cao Lei: "Cloud + AI" assists consumer electronics in building momentum for overseas expansion and innovation.
title_i18n.es: El vicepresidente de Tencent Cloud, Cao Lei: "Nube + IA" ayuda a la electrónica de consumo a acumular energía para expandirse globalmente y prepararse para la innovación.

excerpt_i18n.zh: “云+AI不仅能打破行业内卷的局限，帮助企业走出去，更能助力行业开辟新模式、挖掘新增长”9月17日，在2025腾讯全球数字生态大会消费电子专场，腾讯云副总裁、智能制造与智慧能源负责人曹磊表示。曹磊介绍，因为云技术与 AI 在消费电子行业的广泛应用和落地，今年，颠覆式的商业模式创新、更好支撑出海的常态、AI 场景应用的普及、及围绕体验融合的创新成为行业发展的几个显著趋势。   腾讯云副总裁、智能制造与智慧能源负责人曹磊     大模型深入业务全场景，驱动企业高效率增长 过去一年，消费电子行业价格竞争激烈，不少企业面临发展压力。而AI技术的应用，可推动行业从“拼低价”向“拼创新”转型。荣耀云平台首席架构师欧阳国柱表示，依托腾讯云在多模态数据处理、端到端自动化管理、多云灵活适配等领域的技术优势，荣耀顺利推动自身从“全云化”向“智能化”转型，双方联合开发的AI辅助编码工具，有效提升了研发人员的开发效率与代码质量，为产品创新提速奠定基础。   荣耀云平台首席架构师欧阳国柱   随着大模型的产业应用加速，企业不仅能够实现降本提效，还能挖掘新的增长空间。酷开智能系统研究院院长郭尚锋介绍道，酷开智能与腾讯云展开深度合作，构建了“影视、教育、健康、创作、生活、设备”的超级智能体架构，可提供精准影视推荐、教育学习、健康管理、语音查询电费等多元化服务，推动消费电子企业从“单一设备销售”的传统业务模式，向“服务与体验输出”的全新模式升级，进而实现增长。   酷开智能系统研究院院长郭尚锋 美的集团与腾讯云在全屋智能领域的合作，也是大模型应用的典型实践。美的集团中国区域、全屋智能研发总监谭荣港介绍道，从2022年为COLMO高端空调提供音乐内容和AI语音助手能力，到2024年为灵眸蒸烤箱植入AIoT能力，再到2025年将合作拓展
excerpt_i18n.en:
Cloud + AI can not only break through the limitations of industry involution and help companies expand globally, but also assist industries in exploring new models and uncovering new growth opportunities, said Cao Lei, Vice President of Tencent Cloud and Head of Intelligent Manufacturing and Smart Energy, at the Consumer Electronics Session of the 2025 Tencent Global Digital Ecosystem Summit on September 17. Cao Lei explained that due to the widespread application and implementation of cloud technology and AI in the consumer electronics industry, several significant trends have emerged this year: disruptive business model innovation, better support for the normalization of overseas expansion, the proliferation of AI application scenarios, and innovation centered on experience integration.  

Large models are penetrating all business scenarios, driving high-efficiency growth for enterprises. Over the past year, the consumer electronics industry has faced intense price competition, with many companies under development pressure. The application of AI technology can drive the industry's transition from competing on low prices to competing on innovation. Ouyang Guozhu, Chief Architect of Honor Cloud Platform, stated that leveraging Tencent Cloud's technical advantages in multimodal data processing, end-to-end automated management, and flexible multi-cloud adaptation, Honor has successfully advanced its transformation from full cloudification to intelligence. The jointly developed AI-assisted coding tool has effectively improved developers' efficiency and code quality, laying the foundation for accelerated product innovation.  

As the industrial application of large models accelerates, enterprises can not only achieve cost reduction and efficiency improvement but also...
excerpt_i18n.es: La nube y la IA no solo pueden romper las limitaciones del círculo vicioso interno de la industria y ayudar a las empresas a expandirse globalmente, sino que también pueden impulsar a la industria a abrir nuevos modelos y explorar nuevos crecimientos, declaró Cao Lei, vicepresidente de Tencent Cloud y responsable de fabricación inteligente y energía inteligente, el 17 de septiembre en la sesión especializada en electrónica de consumo de la Cumbre Global de Ecosistema Digital de Tencent 2025. Cao Lei explicó que, debido a la amplia aplicación e implementación de la tecnología en la nube y la IA en la industria de electrónica de consumo, este año se han observado varias tendencias significativas en el desarrollo del sector: innovación disruptiva en modelos de negocio, mejor apoyo para la expansión global como norma, popularización de aplicaciones de escenarios de IA e innovación centrada en la integración de experiencias.

items.title: Data＋AI驱动技术服务升级，腾讯云智能顾问和腾讯云可观测发布全新AI能力，助力客户高效用云

title_i18n.es: Los servicios impulsados por datos e IA mejoran la tecnología. El Asesor de Inteligencia de Tencent Cloud y la Plataforma de Observabilidad de Tencent Cloud lanzan nuevas capacidades de IA para ayudar a los clientes a utilizar la nube de manera eficiente.

excerpt_i18n.en: On September 17, Tencent Cloud announced two major upgrades to its technical services, launching the intelligent advisor "Excellent Architecture + Multi-Agent" and an observable AI platform, driving professional services with Data + AI to help customers use cloud services more efficiently. Xu Yongzhou, Vice President of Technical Services at Tencent Cloud, stated at the 2025 Tencent Global Digital Ecosystem Conference's Excellent Architecture and Observability Forum that under the major trend of Data + AI, the concept of technical services requires some transformation—shifting from building tools and processes to viewing services as products. Over the past few years, Tencent Cloud's most valuable experience in service exploration has been accumulating process and architecture governance data and continuously improving technical service quality through AI. In 2025, Tencent Cloud's intelligent advisor achieved a comprehensive upgrade to "Excellent Architecture + Multi-Agent," introducing excellent architecture standards, standardized productized practices, and launching the new intelligent advisor Multi-Agent, the world's first excellent architecture AI governance platform. Through visualization and AI Agent capabilities, it helps enterprises achieve more efficient governance of excellent cloud architectures. This upgrade represents a leap from "product-level Agent" to "customer scenario-level Multi-Agent," no longer just checking cloud servers or databases in isolation but understanding scenarios such as "new game launches."
excerpt_i18n.es: El 17 de septiembre, Tencent Cloud anunció dos grandes mejoras en servicios técnicos: el lanzamiento del asesor inteligente "Arquitectura Superior + Multi-Agent" y una plataforma de IA observable, impulsando servicios profesionales con Data + IA para ayudar a los clientes a utilizar la nube de manera eficiente. Xu Yongzhou, vicepresidente de servicios técnicos de Tencent Cloud, declaró en el foro especializado sobre arquitectura superior y observabilidad de la Conferencia Global de Ecosistema Digital de Tencent 2025 que, bajo la gran tendencia de Data + IA, la filosofía de los servicios técnicos necesita cierta transformación, cambiando la mentalidad de construir herramientas y procesos para ver el servicio como un producto. La experiencia más valiosa explorada por Tencent Cloud en servicios durante los últimos años ha sido gobernar procesos y arquitecturas.

items.title: 腾讯云黄世飞：全面升级Data+AI能力，构建企业智能化数据基座
items.raw_excerpt: 9月17日，在腾讯全球数字生态大会上，腾讯云宣布大数据产品矩阵全面升级Data+AI能力体系，覆盖底层架构、数据平台、数据应用等全流程，帮助企业应对数据治理、多模态融合与智能化应用等挑战。 腾讯云副总裁黄世飞发表主题演讲 腾讯云副总裁黄世飞表示，腾讯云致力于融合Data+AI一体化能力，并引入AI Agent赋能，旨在解决传统数据平台在多模态处理和智能化上的不足，推动企业形成差异化AI竞争力，释放数据价值。   升级云原生数据基座，打造“开箱即用”的数据智能平台 近年来，随着算力成本的下降和开源大模型的普及，数据逐渐成为企业智能化发展的关键差异化因素。然而，传统数据平台在多模态数据处理、实时性、知识库构建等方面仍面临挑战。  对此，腾讯云提出构建“AI-Ready”数据智能平台，通过云原生架构、Data+AI一体化和Agent增强，为企业提供面向未来的数据底座。 在底层架构方面，腾讯云推出了DIaaS（数据智能即服务）理念，打造多模态智能数据湖TCLake，结合流湖引擎和企业级搜索ES，全面提升数据处理效率与智能化水平。 TCLake实现了结构化与非结构化数据的统一管理，并通过Lakehouse架构大幅提升计算性能，降低存储成本。 流湖引擎支持流批一体和秒级分析，将传统小时级的数据处理加速至秒级，运维成本降低近一半。 面向企业知识库构建，腾讯云增强了ES的云上能力，支持文本与向量的混合检索，并引入AutoRAG一键化生成方案，在10亿规模向量场景下实现毫秒级响应，查询性能提升10倍，存储节省高达90%。   WeData一体化平台升级，打通数据与AI全流程 在平台层，腾讯云WeData升级为端到端的一体化Data+AI平台，打通数据接入、治理、建模、训练到推理全链路，统一管理多模态数据、模型和指标资产，帮助企业实现从DataOps到AIOps的

title_i18n.es: Huang Shifei de Tencent Cloud: Actualización integral de las capacidades de datos e IA para construir una base de datos inteligente empresarial.

excerpt_i18n.en:
On September 17, at the Tencent Global Digital Ecosystem Conference, Tencent Cloud announced a comprehensive upgrade of its big data product portfolio into a Data+AI capability system, covering the entire process from underlying architecture to data platforms and data applications, to help enterprises tackle challenges such as data governance, multimodal integration, and intelligent applications. 

Huang Shifei, Vice President of Tencent Cloud, delivered a keynote speech stating that Tencent Cloud is committed to integrating Data+AI capabilities and introducing AI Agent empowerment to address the shortcomings of traditional data platforms in multimodal processing and intelligence, helping enterprises build differentiated AI competitiveness and unlock data value.

The upgrade includes a cloud-native data foundation to create an out-of-the-box data intelligence platform. In recent years, as computing costs have decreased and open-source large models have become widespread, data has increasingly become a key differentiator for enterprise intelligence development. However, traditional data platforms still face challenges in multimodal data processing, real-time capabilities, and knowledge base construction.

In response, Tencent Cloud proposed building an AI-Ready data intelligence platform, providing enterprises with a future-proof data foundation through cloud-native architecture, Data+AI integration, and Agent enhancement. 

At the underlying architecture level, Tencent Cloud introduced the DIaaS (Data Intelligence as a Service) concept, creating the multimodal intelligent data lake TCLake, combined with the stream-lake engine and enterprise search ES, to comprehensively enhance data processing efficiency and intelligence. TCLake achieves the unification of structured and unstructured data.
excerpt_i18n.es: El 17 de septiembre, en la Conferencia Global de Ecosistema Digital de Tencent, Tencent Cloud anunció la actualización integral de su matriz de productos de big data hacia un sistema de capacidades Data+IA, cubriendo todo el proceso desde la arquitectura subyacente, plataformas de datos hasta aplicaciones de datos, para ayudar a las empresas a enfrentar desafíos como la gobernanza de datos, la fusión multimodal y las aplicaciones inteligentes. El vicepresidente de Tencent Cloud, Huang Shifei, declaró en su discurso temático que Tencent Cloud se dedica a integrar capacidades unificadas de Data+IA, incorporando agentes de IA para abordar las deficiencias de las plataformas de datos tradicionales en procesamiento multimodal e inteligencia, impulsando la formación de competitividad diferenciada en IA para las empresas y liberando el valor de los datos. Actualización de datos nativos de la nube.

items.title: 腾讯云智算三大核心升级 推动AI Infra从“支撑”向“引擎”跨越
items.raw_excerpt: 9月17日，腾讯全球数字生态大会Agent + Infra专场聚焦“智能体驱动云基础设施跃进升级”这一主题，汇聚众多行业领军者，共同探索AI时代基础设施的技术突破与产业实践。腾讯云智算各产品负责人及行业客户深入解读AI原生云架构、主动服务型基础设施、全链路安全体系等核心议题，同时发布多项重磅成果，为智能体规模化落地筑牢技术底座。 在论坛中，腾讯云副总裁李力正式宣布，腾讯云智算面向“更贴近Agent的AI Infra”重磅升级。腾讯云建立包括Agent Infra解决方案+Cloud Mate云专家服务智能体与全链路安全能力为一体的完整解决方案，帮助 Agentic AI 从“实验室”走向“生产级”。 李力表示，未来两年，部署Agent的企业将翻倍，GenAI相关的IaaS支出增速将达到192%。随着Agent数量爆发式增长，企业对云计算基础设施的需求，将会快速从“资源供给”升级为“业务价值”，AI Infra基础设施必须具备更快的推理效率、更灵活的工具集成、更可靠的系统保障和更自动化的服务能力。腾讯云智算体系核心优势在于“同源同构”，无需打造AI专属存储等设施，依托过往打磨的云原生能力，即可承接智算需求，实现云与智算能力的深度协同。目前，腾讯云智算已实现“一云多芯”软硬协同，支持公有云、专有云、边缘环境的同源同构部署，为交通、制造、具身智能等行业提供从模型训练到推理落地的全链路支撑。 图：腾讯云智算能力升级，成为更贴近Agent的AI原生云 在AI Infra底座层面，腾讯云智算基于在云计算、分布式存储、高性能网络等基础设施方面的深厚积累和场景优化，大幅提升云上资源的性能和利用率，最终实现降本增效。模型启动提速17倍，大规模服务扩容时间从10分钟缩短至34秒；多模态推理加速4倍，自研推理引擎覆盖生文、生图、生视频等模型；通过内存优化与通讯协议升级等创新，显著降低计算开销，推

excerpt_i18n.en:
On September 17, the Agent + Infra session of Tencent's Global Digital Ecosystem Summit focused on the theme "Intelligent Agents Driving Leapfrog Upgrades in Cloud Infrastructure," bringing together numerous industry leaders to explore technological breakthroughs and industrial practices of infrastructure in the AI era. Tencent Cloud's intelligent computing product leaders and industry clients provided in-depth interpretations of core topics such as AI-native cloud architecture, proactive service-oriented infrastructure, and full-chain security systems, while also releasing multiple significant achievements to strengthen the technical foundation for the large-scale deployment of intelligent agents.  

During the forum, Li Li, Vice President of Tencent Cloud, officially announced a major upgrade of Tencent Cloud Intelligent Computing toward "AI Infra Closer to Agents." Tencent Cloud has established a comprehensive solution integrating Agent Infra solutions, Cloud Mate cloud expert service agents, and full-chain security capabilities to help Agentic AI transition from the "lab" to "production-grade."  

Li Li stated that over the next two years, the number of enterprises deploying agents will double, and the growth rate of GenAI-related IaaS spending will reach 192%. With the explosive growth in the number of agents, enterprises' demand for cloud computing infrastructure will rapidly shift from "resource supply" to "business value." AI Infra infrastructure must possess faster inference efficiency, more flexible tool integration, more reliable system guarantees, and more automated service capabilities. The core advantage of Tencent Cloud's intelligent computing system lies in its "same-source, same-structure" approach, eliminating the need to build AI-specific storage and other facilities, leveraging its well-honed cloud-native capabilities.
excerpt_i18n.es: El 17 de septiembre, la sesión especializada Agent + Infra de la Conferencia Global de Ecosistema Digital de Tencent se centró en el tema "Los agentes inteligentes impulsan el avance y la mejora de la infraestructura en la nube", reuniendo a numerosos líderes de la industria para explorar conjuntamente los avances tecnológicos y las prácticas industriales de la infraestructura en la era de la IA. Los responsables de los productos de computación inteligente de Tencent Cloud y los clientes del sector analizaron en profundidad temas clave como la arquitectura nativa de IA en la nube, la infraestructura de servicios proactivos y el sistema de seguridad de cadena completa, al mismo tiempo que presentaron varios logros importantes, sentando una base tecnológica sólida para la implementación a gran escala de agentes inteligentes. Durante el foro, Li Li, vicepresidente de Tencent Cloud, anunció oficialmente una importante actualización de la computación inteligente de Tencent Cloud hacia una "IA Infra más cercana a los Agent". items.title: 智能体落地进程加速！腾讯云面向全球发布智能体开发平台3.0
items.raw_excerpt: 智能体落地进程持续加速。9月17日，在2025腾讯全球数字生态大会上，腾讯云宣布智能体开发平台3.0（ADP3.0）面向全球上线，腾讯优图实验室关键智能体技术将持续开源。 腾讯云副总裁、腾讯云智能负责人、腾讯优图实验室负责人吴运声 腾讯云副总裁、腾讯云智能负责人、腾讯优图实验室负责人吴运声表示：“面向行业旺盛的智能体开发需求，腾讯云智能体开发平台近3个月持续攻坚，完成近600个功能上线，ADP3.0新版本在RAG能力、Workflow、Multi-Agent、应用评测和插件生态等方面全面升级。同时，腾讯将持续开源优图实验室积累多年的AI能力、技术储备以及配套组件，与全球的开发者、企业和研究机构一起共建共创，推动智能体生态持续繁荣。” 同时，腾讯云智能体开发平台结合企业的需求和腾讯自身的优势能力，针对性推出了智能质检、媒体内容处理、营销增长、智能巡检等Agent，帮助企业在具体场景落地智能体；结合腾讯云智能数智人的产品能力，平台还推出了IP Agent，进一步盘活知识资产、提升用户交互体验。   ADP核心能力升级，打造面向企业实战的智能体 腾讯云智能体开发平台3.0在RAG、Multi-Agent、WorkFlow和应用构建工具链等四个方面全面升级。 在RAG上，平台支持更完善的知识库管理与运维能力，如文档冲突对比、自定义切分片段等，并扩展主流数据库接入，显著提升表格问答准确率。同时，技术从传统RAG升级至Agentic RAG，知识问答效果明显增强，准确率进一步提升。 Multi-Agent方面，平台支持多方式配置Agent协同，支持自由转交、工作流编排、P&E协同模版等，企业可低门槛搭建复杂应用。目前平台已全面支持MCP，插件生态扩展至140+。 WorkFlow方面，智能体开发平台在业界率先支持全局Agent视野，支持节点智能回退。新版本在工作流中新

excerpt_i18n.en: The deployment of intelligent agents continues to accelerate. On September 17, at the 2025 Tencent Global Digital Ecosystem Conference, Tencent Cloud announced the global launch of its Intelligent Agent Development Platform 3.0 (ADP 3.0), with key agent technologies from the Tencent YouTu Lab to be continuously open-sourced. Wu Yunsheng, Vice President of Tencent Cloud, Head of Tencent Cloud Intelligence, and Head of the Tencent YouTu Lab, stated that in response to strong industry demand for agent development, Tencent Cloud's Intelligent Agent Development Platform has completed nearly 600 feature updates over the past three months. The new ADP 3.0 version is comprehensively upgraded in RAG capabilities, Workflow, Multi-Agent, application evaluation, and plugin ecosystem. Meanwhile, Tencent will continue to open-source AI capabilities, technical reserves, and supporting components accumulated by the YouTu Lab over the years, collaborating with global developers, enterprises, and research institutions to co-create and promote the prosperity of the intelligent agent ecosystem. Additionally, Tencent Cloud's Intelligent Agent Development Platform has introduced targeted agents such as intelligent quality inspection, media content processing, marketing growth, and intelligent inspection, leveraging enterprise needs and Tencent's core strengths to help businesses deploy agents in specific scenarios. Combined with the capabilities of Tencent Cloud's Intelligent Digital Human product, the platform has also launched IP Agent to further activate knowledge assets and enhance user interaction experience. ADP core capabilities have been upgraded to create enterprise-ready intelligent agents. Tencent Cloud's Intelligent Agent Development Platform 3.0 has made significant advancements in RAG,
excerpt_i18n.es: El proceso de implementación de agentes inteligentes continúa acelerándose. El 17 de septiembre, en la Conferencia Global de Ecosistema Digital Tencent 2025, Tencent Cloud anunció el lanzamiento global de la plataforma de desarrollo de agentes inteligentes 3.0 (ADP3.0), y las tecnologías clave de agentes inteligentes del laboratorio Tencent YouTu seguirán siendo de código abierto. Wu Yunsheng, vicepresidente de Tencent Cloud, responsable de Tencent Cloud Intelligence y del laboratorio Tencent YouTu, declaró: "Ante la fuerte demanda de desarrollo de agentes inteligentes en la industria, la plataforma de desarrollo de agentes inteligentes de Tencent Cloud ha completado casi 600 funciones en los últimos 3 meses. items.title: 生命科学大模型加速新药研发 腾讯全面推动AI+医疗健康普惠
items.raw_excerpt: 2025腾讯全球数字生态大会9月16日-17日举行，腾讯宣布全面开放AI落地能力及优势场景，助力“好用的AI”在千行百业中加速落地。腾讯健康总裁、腾讯生命科学实验室负责人、腾讯健康普惠实验室负责人吴文达医生，在智慧医疗专场宣布三个涵盖大模型、生命科学、用户主动健康管理的全面加速计划，并提出了“AI+医疗健康”未来发展路径的七个关键路标。 吴文达医生认为人工智能正从根本上改变人们管理和维护健康的方式 腾讯一直致力于以AI技术助力医疗服务创新，一方面帮助患者提升就诊体验，另一方面助力临床医护提升服务效率和质量。截至目前，大模型驱动的AI导辅诊服务，在全国34个省、直辖市、自治区的近10000家各级医疗机构应用。腾讯觅影的医疗影像AI在全国各地超500家医疗机构普及，累计辅助医护为近1000万人次患者进行了各类医学检查。各类“开箱即用”的医疗AI解决方案服务超过1300家机构，涵盖医院、药械企业、科研院校、医疗科技企业。 吴文达医生指出：“在人工智能+医疗健康这条路上面，我们拼的其实是两个——一是耐力，二是定力，两个都是长跑。”人工智能正从根本上改变人们管理和维护健康的方式，它使得健康管理变得更具个性化、预测性和参与性。AI的核心能力在于整合多源、动态、连续的个体数据，并通过算法挖掘数据背后的隐含关联，将“数据碎片”转化为“健康画像”，进而推动健康服务从“标准化”向“个性化”转型。     在助力医疗健康行业全面拥抱人工智能方面，腾讯通过“知识-模型-应用”的全栈模式，加速医疗健康行业AI大模型的开发与应用。帮助医疗机构通过腾讯云智能体开发平台、医疗知识图谱等工具，构建和管理专业RAG知识体系，为AI大模型提供高质量的训练数据和知识基础，将复杂的医学概念、关系和实体结构化，形成一张庞大的知识网络，从而帮助医疗机构快速开发出符

title_i18n.en: Life Science Large Models Accelerate New Drug Development, Tencent Comprehensively Promotes AI + Healthcare for Universal Benefit.
title_i18n.es: Los grandes modelos de ciencias de la vida aceleran el desarrollo de nuevos medicamentos. Tencent impulsa integralmente la IA aplicada a la salud para lograr beneficios universales.

excerpt_i18n.en:
The 2025 Tencent Global Digital Ecosystem Summit was held on September 16-17. Tencent announced the full opening of its AI implementation capabilities and advantageous scenarios to accelerate the adoption of "practical AI" across various industries. Dr. Wu Wenda, President of Tencent Health, Head of Tencent Life Science Laboratory, and Head of Tencent Health Equity Laboratory, announced three comprehensive acceleration plans covering large models, life sciences, and proactive user health management at the Smart Healthcare session. He also proposed seven key milestones for the future development of "AI + healthcare."  

Dr. Wu believes artificial intelligence is fundamentally transforming how people manage and maintain their health. Tencent has been committed to driving healthcare innovation with AI technology, aiming to improve patient experiences and enhance the efficiency and quality of clinical care. To date, AI-powered consultation guidance services, driven by large models, have been implemented in nearly 10,000 medical institutions across 34 provinces, municipalities, and autonomous regions. Tencent's medical imaging AI, Miying, is used in over 500 medical institutions nationwide, assisting healthcare professionals in conducting various medical examinations for nearly 10 million patients. Ready-to-use medical AI solutions serve more than 1,300 organizations, including hospitals, pharmaceutical and medical device companies, research institutions, and healthcare technology firms.  

Dr. Wu emphasized, "In the field of AI + healthcare, what truly matters are two things: endurance and perseverance—both are long-term endeavors." Artificial intelligence is fundamentally changing how people manage and maintain their health.
excerpt_i18n.es: La Cumbre Global de Ecosistema Digital de Tencent 2025 se celebrará los días 16 y 17 de septiembre. Tencent anunció la apertura integral de sus capacidades de implementación de IA y escenarios ventajosos para acelerar la aplicación de "IA útil" en todas las industrias. El doctor Wu Wenda, presidente de Tencent Health, responsable del Laboratorio de Ciencias de la Vida de Tencent y del Laboratorio de Salud Inclusiva de Tencent, anunció en la sesión especial de atención médica inteligente tres planes de aceleración integral que abarcan modelos grandes, ciencias de la vida y gestión proactiva de la salud por parte de los usuarios, y propuso siete hitos clave para la futura trayectoria de desarrollo de "IA + atención médica". El doctor Wu Wenda considera que la inteligencia artificial está cambiando fundamentalmente la forma en que las personas gestionan y mantienen su salud. Tencent siempre se ha comprometido.

items.title: Detecting and reducing scheming in AI models
items.raw_excerpt: Apollo Research and OpenAI developed evaluations for hidden misalignment (“scheming”) and found behaviors consistent with scheming in controlled tests across frontier models. The team shared concrete examples and stress tests of an early method to reduce scheming.
